scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -g d3-dispatch:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-cloud.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-cloud.js -c -m -o build/d3-cloud.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-cloud.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-cloud.js build/d3-cloud.min.js
